wikipedia_page.main: Chrystal Rose is best known as a British television personality who presented the short-lived talk show The Chrystal Rose Show, produced by Carlton Television and broadcast on ITV from 1993 to 1994. She is also the mother of Louise Rose who was in the short-lived band Precious who competed in the 1999 Eurovision Song Contest.

response: The Chrystal Rose Show is a British talk show presented by Chrystal Rose. Produced by Carlton Television, the programme discussed controversial subjects and was first broadcast on ITV in January 1993."The Chrystal Rose Show", IMDb
